name: Caoba - Oro - Esplendido
additionalNotes: Mahogany Cigars is a family business with more than three decades of experience in the production of premium handmade cigars. Located in the heart of the Dominican Republic, in Santo Domingo, the company is committed to working diligently to improve the customer experience, striving for daily improvement to offer a distinctive product that prioritizes quality above all. They extend a warm invitation to explore their company and the exquisite cigars they produce, welcoming you to become part of the Mahogany Cigars family.
